dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Li Jihong, Shandong Agricultural University, Tai’an(China), Key Laboratory of Agricultural Ecology and Environment, College of Forestry
Xing Ganyan, Shandong Agricultural University, Tai’an(China), Key Laboratory of Agricultural Ecology and Environment, College of Forestry
Li Jianhua, Shandong Agricultural University, Tai’an(China), Key Laboratory of Agricultural Ecology and Environment, College of Forestry

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 本文以“美登”（Blomidon）、“北蓝”（Northblue）、“蓝丰”（Bluecrop）三个蓝莓品种继代培养45d的瓶苗为试材，采用植物组织培养技术，研究了一氧化氮（nitric oxide，NO）供体硝普纳（sodium nitroprusside，SNP）对三个蓝莓品种不定芽的平均分化倍数、苗木质量、生根率、根系质量及在不同浓度条件下其生理生化效应。结果表明，在20μmol•L. 1 SNP浓度条件下，这三个蓝莓品种不定芽的平均分化倍数、平均株高、茎鲜重及茎干重与对照相比均达到显著水平；其不定芽的生根率、根长、根鲜重及根干重与对照相比达到显著水平；添加NO消除剂（cP．1rIO）能进一步的验证20μmol•L. 1 SNP对蓝莓不定芽的分化及生根的作用；20μmol•L. 1的SNP能有效地提高‘美登’、‘北蓝’及‘蓝丰’分化苗叶绿素含量、可溶性蛋白质含量及过氧化物酶的活性。

Plantlets of 40 days’ subculture from three blueberry cultivars ‘Blomidon’, ‘Northblue’ and ‘ Bluecrop’ were used for materials in the study. We investigated the effects of nitric oxide (NO) donor sodium nitroprusside(SNP）on the adventitious buds’ differentiation, the quality of plantlets, rooting rate, it quality of root and physiological changes for the three blueberry cuhivars. The results showed that differentiation multiples of adventitious buds, the average plant height, stem fresh weight and dry weight were reached significant level compared to the control at 20μmol•L. 1 SNP. Besides, the rooting rate, average root length, root fresh weight and dry weight were also reached significant level compared to the control. The effects of 20 μmol•L. 1 SNP on the differentiation and rooting were effectively verified by the addition of NO elimination agent (PTIO). The contents of chlorophyll and soluble protein, peroxidase activity were effectively increased in the differentiating planflets of the three blueberry cultivars.

ags:resource.dc:title: Study on extraction of ferulic acid from allium cepa l. by ultra high pressure method
正交实验优化提取洋葱皮中阿魏酸工艺的研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Chen Haiqin, An yang infant Normal eollege, Anyang(China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 研究采用超高压提取洋葱皮中阿魏酸的最佳工艺条件，并且同回流提取法和超声提取法进行比较。在单因素实验的基础上，采用L9（3. ）正交实验对超高压提取洋葱皮中阿魏酸的工艺进行优化，以阿魏酸的得率为指标，考察料液比（g：mL）、乙醇浓度、超高压压力、加压时间对阿魏酸得率的影响。得到优化的工艺条件为：固液比1：22、乙醇浓度75％、超高压压力320MPa，超高压时间4min，该条件下阿魏酸的得率可达0.322％。超高压提取阿魏酸得率高，提取时间短，是一种提取洋葱皮中阿魏酸的适宜方法。

Research on the optimum of extracting ferulic acid from Alliunm cepa L. and comparison between reflux extraction and ultrasonic extraction. Based on the signal factor test, the technics of extracting ferulic acid from Alliunm cepa L. was optimized by the L9 (34) orthogonal design. With the extraction yield of ferulic acid as index, the influence of solid to liquid ratio, ethanol concentration, UHP pressure, UHP time were studied. Optimum extraction conditions were as follows： solid to liquid ratiol ：22 (g： mL), ethanol 75%, UHP pressure 320Mpa and UHP time 4min, The yield of UA was 0. 322%. The UHP extraction method was a suitable method for it has higher yield and shorter extraction time.

ags:resource.dc:title: Analysis of the calculation method of the flood routing process
蓄滞洪区洪水演进过程计算方法分析

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Cheng Xianglong, Northwest A and F University, Yangling (China), College of Water Resources and Architectural Engineering
Zhang Yaozhe, Northwest A and F University, Yangling (China), College of Water Resources and Architectural Engineering
Zhang Xiaoshuai, Northwest A and F University, Yangling (China), College of Water Resources and Architectural Engineering

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 本文以对小滩坡蓄滞洪区新建铁路后所作的防洪评价计算为实例，介绍了蓄滞洪区启用时，新建铁路上下游两个蓄水单元间的水体交换即流量过程的计算分析方法。整个蓄滞洪区以新建铁路为界分为上、下游两个蓄水单元，铁路桥涵过流能力按宽顶堰计算，根据上下游蓄滞洪区水位一面积～库容关系，采用试算法计算蓄滞洪区洪水流量过程。计算得到了蓄滞洪区两种工况下的洪水流量过程，结果显示新建铁路对小滩坡蓄滞洪区的防洪能力影响甚微，蓄滞洪区能够最大限度地发挥蓄滞洪水的能力。本文对于小滩坡蓄滞洪区内修建铁路后的洪水演进过程的计算，方法简单实用，对于相似蓄滞洪区的防洪评价计算有一定参考价值。

A flood control evaluation is made after railways are newly built in the Xiaotanpo flood detention basin. In this article, it is taken as an example to introduce a method to analyze and calculate the discharge process between the upstream and the downstream water storage units, when the flood detention basin is enabled. The whole flood detention basin is divided into two units by the newly built railways and the overcurrent capacity of the railway bridges and culverts will be calculated by the formula of Broad - crested weir. According to the relationship among the water level, the area and the storage capacity of Xiaotanpo flood detention basin, trial method is adopted to calculate the discharge process of the flood detention basin. By calculating, the discharge process is obtained and it shows that the newly built railways have little influence on the flood detention basin. So flood detention basin is able to maximize the capacity to storage and detent the water. The method to calculate the discharge process of Xiaotanpo flood detention basin where railways are built newly is simple and practical and it has certain reference value to analogous flood detention basin.

ags:resource.dc:title: Study on electrochemistry properties of hydrotalcite- like compounds modified electrode
类水滑石修饰电极的电化学性质研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Jin Rongrong, Shandong Agricultural University, Taian(China), College of Chemistry and Material Science
Li Lifang, Shandong Agricultural University, Taian(China), College of Chemistry and Material Science
Zhao Fan, Shandong Agricultural University, Taian(China), College of Chemistry and Material Science

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 用循环伏安法（CV）对聚苯胺（PANI）与不同类水滑石（HTIc）逐层滴涂修饰的玻碳电极（GEE）进行了表征。研究结果表明，随HTlc中n（Mg. ＋）／n（Al. ＋）变化，修饰电极PANI／HTlc／GCE上Fe（CN）6. -氧化还原峰电流先增加后降低，说明此修饰电极的促电子转移作用受HTlc层板电荷密度的影响。当MgAl-HTlc片层中部分Mg. ＋、Al. ＋金属离子被Co. ＋、Ni. ＋和Fe. ＋分别替代后，得到的掺杂HTlc修饰电极均使Fe（CN）6. -的氧化还原电流减小，表明修饰电极的电化学性质与类水滑石的片层组成有关。

The electrochemical behavior of PANI/HTIc/GCE electrode (modified glassy carbon electrode by polyaniline (ANI) and hydrotalcite - like compounds (HTlc)) were investigated, using cyclic voltammetry (CV) method and Fe(CN)6. -probe. The reduction current and oxidation current first increased and then decreased as then (Mg2＋)/n ( Al3＋) of HTlc layer increasing. This showed that the electron transfer was controlled by layer charge density of HTlc. When the metal ions of Mg - Al - HTle layer were partial substituted by Co2＋ , Ni2＋ or Fe3 ＋, the reduction current and oxidation current of Fe (CN) 6. - were reduced. This result showed that the component of HTIc layer impacted the electrochemistry properties.

ags:resource.dc:title: County tourism industry development’s swot analysis, developing mode, and support system--case of Hainan Baotiong
县域旅游产业发展的SWOT分析、发展模式与保障体系——以海南保亭为例

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Fu Yeqin, Huaqiao University, Quanzhou(China), College of Tourism
Zheng Xiangmin, China Tourism Academy, Beijing(China)
Liu Weihua, Baoting Li and Miao Autonomous County People’s Government, Baoting(China)

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 以海南保亭的县域旅游发展实践为例，在深入考察该县旅游产业发展状况和研究国内县域旅游研究成果的基础上，采用SWOT分析方法，对保亭旅游产业发展的整体态势进行了深入分析；以此为依据，提出由发展目标、品牌推广策略、产品体系构成、开发模式选择和“三全”式发展方式构成的旅游产业发展模式，其中特别介绍了保亭县首创的“大区小镇”乡村旅游开发模式；为保障旅游产业发展模式的顺利实施，对区域合作、资源环境保护、招商引资、服务质量提升、专业人才汇集、安全应急管理等困扰保亭旅游发展的问题，设计了解决方案；最终形成保亭县旅游产业发展的策略系统，以期对国内少数民族农业贫困地区的县域旅游发展提供借鉴参考。

Taking the county tourism development practice in Hainan Baoting for example, on the basis of stud- ying the county’s tourism industry development and researching Chinese County Tourism’s research findings, employing SWOT analysis method, probing the overall development of the Baoting tourism industry. According to the conclusion, the paper puts forward the mode of tourism industry development including the development goals, branding strategy, a product system, exploring mode and three comprehensive developments, and introduces specially the rural tourism development mode of ‘large tourist attractions - small towns and villages’ origi- nated by Baoting. In order to ensure the smooth implementation of the mode, the paper designs the solutions for the problems hindering Baoting’ tourism development such as the regional cooperation, the protection of resources and environment, the investment, the promotion of service quality, the attracting talents, the safety and emergency management. Ultimately it establishes the strategy system of Baoting tourism industry development in order to provide some references for the Chinese minorities’ agriculture poor areas’s county tourism development.

ags:resource.dc:title: The study on groundwater change trend and dynamic prediction of Tai’an city
泰安市地下水变化趋势及动态预测研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Song Yunfeng, Tai’an Hydrology and Water Resources Survey Bureau
Zhang Qin, Tai’an Hydrology and Water Resources Survey Bureau
Zhang Jiangbo, Tai’an Hydrology and Water Resources Survey Bureau

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 在泰安市地下水位动态变化概述的基础上，利用55眼测井实测资料，分析了泰安市13年的水位变化情况。对观测井1978～2011年的地下水埋深年变差系列值和相应的年降水量开展一元回归分析，建立一元线性回归方程式，进行了年降水量影响预测；对东平县大清河以南的地区采用典型区回归预测；对典型区建立了数学模型，利用三维地下水有限差分计算软件MODFLOW进行地下水数值模拟，实测值与模拟水位过程线对比，进行了典型区模型预测。

Based on the dynamic change of groundwater level in Tai’an City, by using 55 observation – wells”measured data, the water level change in 13 years of Tai~n was analyzed. For the groundwater depth of observation wells” annual variation in series value from 1978 to 2011 and the corresponding annual precipitation, mathe- matical regression analysis was carried out, one -place linear regression equation was set up, and the influence of annual precipitation was forecast. ; for the southern area of Da Qing River in Dong Ping County typical zone regression prediction was used. ; and mathematical model was established for the typical region, then numerical simulation of groundwater was made by using Three - dimensional finite difference calculation software of ground- water named MODFLOW, made comparison between the measured values and simulated water level hydrograph, and made the prediction of typical region model successfully.

ags:resource.dc:title: Antioxidant activities of garlic green pigments
大蒜绿色素体外抗氧化能力的研究

dc:creator.ags:creatorPersonal: Xu Xuan, Shandong Agricultural University, Taian(China), College of Food Science and Engineering
Qiao Xuguang, Shandong Agricultural University, Taian(China), College of Food Science and Engineering

dc:description.dcterms:abstract: 本试验采用了羟自由基体系、超氧阴离子体系、ABTS体系和DPPH体系4种不同的体外抗氧化模型进行大蒜绿色素体外抗氧化活性研究，结果表明，大蒜绿色素对羟自由基（•OH）、超氧阴离子（O2-•）、ABTS自由基、DPPH自由基均表现出抗氧化活性，且随着大蒜绿色素浓度增加，自由基清除率显著增加。大蒜绿色素清除自由基的能力顺序为：羟自由基〉超氧阴离子〉ABTS自由基〉DPPH自由基。

The study on the in vitro antioxidant activity of garlic green pigments was conducted with four different in vitro antioxidant models, they were hydroxyl radical system, superoxide anion system, DPPH system and ABTS system. The results showed that the pigments presented antioxidant activity on all of the four radicals. As the concentration of garlic green pigments raised, the rate of radical scavenging increased significandy. The abili- ty of garlic green pigments on scavenging free radical were ranked as follows ： hydroxyl radicals 〉 superoxide an- ion radicals 〉 ABTS radicals 〉 DPPH radicals.
